## Xilo AI Tutor Project

This project is an AI tutor website built using Microsoft Phi 3.5 model, optimized for Intel GPU with XMX engines.

### Key Features:
- Intel XPU optimization with PyTorch
- Phi 3.5 model integration
- Web-based interface
- GPU-accelerated inference

### Architecture:
- Backend: Flask with Intel XPU PyTorch
- Frontend: HTML/CSS/JavaScript
- Model: Microsoft Phi 3.5 Mini
- Hardware: Intel GPU with XMX engines

### Setup Requirements:
- Intel GPU with XMX engines (Battlemage architecture)
- PyTorch XPU version
- Intel Extension for PyTorch
- Phi 3.5 model files
